title: Hour 2: LA LeBron
description:
Stephen A, Robert Griffin III and Chris "Mad Dog" Russo discuss how much LeBron values building a championship team, if the Ravens are holding Lamar back and Stephen A talks about his memoir: Straight Shooter.

itunes:subtitle: Does a LeBron extension increase the Lakers near future success?
